item.title: About
item.description: About Eldiron Create your own classic role playing games (RPGs) with Eldiron, a cross platform and open source RPG Creator written in Rust.
item.content:
About Eldiron

Create your own classic role playing games (RPGs) with Eldiron, a cross platform and open source RPG Creator written in Rust.
